attributes.title: this app is terrible!
attributes.review: I’m not a fan of donald trump, but since he is in office i figured i’d download the app to keep up with political news. however, the app is very laggy and it glitches out and crashes every time i attempt to open it and use it. an app should not be up on the store if it’s not going to properly work and function like it should!

attributes.title: best app
attributes.review: was ecstatic to see that the Trump 2020 campaign came out with an app! the 1.2 star rating is confusing me, though, it’s def 5 stars. can’t wait to see what happens next!

attributes.title: The absolute worst
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes to support out oh so GREAT president but the app kept on crashing every time I try to open it and whenever I do get into the app, it’s super laggy. I’m so disappointed, I thought our president could at the very least make a useable app where ✨supporters ✨like me can use it to assist our president in the upcoming election. Please do better for ur supporters ☺️☺️☺️

attributes.title: Spam
attributes.review: I was looking forward to seeing what trump was doing when I downloaded this app. I was extremely disappointed with the amount of spam I received. The wait time for the app to download was about an hour and took up all of the storage that I had left on my phone. I deleted the app, and I am agitated. I would not recommend downloading it. 🧚

attributes.title: Why everyone putting one star
attributes.review: This is my favorite app and everyone is putting one star because of tiktok but it’s my favorite

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and immediately the app crashed. I waited a while before opening again and again the app crashes. Numerous tries later I finally open the app and my phone crashed. My phone powered off and when I turned it back in I noticed that most of my apps and photos were gone. What’s going on here?

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: Hello. I downloaded this app with the hopes of learning what Trump was going to do for the next election. Not only was I extremely disappointed, I am disgusted by the content posted. I am seriously considering moving countries should he be re-elected. Please fix this in the next update by maybe adding “Obama” instead of Trump, I feel like it would really benefit the country!

attributes.title: Lack of info
attributes.review: I am shocked to see it offered to show single pedobears near my area. The first one that came up was Trump. Will rate 1 star  just because the app did open but the content is all trash. Do I recommend this app? If you have a brain and at least 1 functioning brain cell- no I don’t. If you’re brain dead , well buddy this is the graveyard you’re looking for .

attributes.title: BAD.
attributes.review: The minute I opened this app a small, chubby, orange hand tried to grab me by the p***y!!! Tried to ignore it because of course that’s a flattering sign of affection but somehow the app sensed my Jewish heritage and started sending me notifications that all began with: hey jew. Had to get rid of my whole phone after it shut down every time I tried to go to a news website that wasn’t Fox News.

attributes.title: no❤️✨😻
attributes.review:
this app is just trash. who even said MAGA was actually gonna happen when trump is still running for president. it definitely won’t happen with him around. he’s just ‘making america worse again.’ MAWA. that should be the new term for him. and also he doesn’t believe women’s right whilst obama does. i will stand up for what is right which is getting trump out of the white house. he is a white, racist, and rapist. ALSO #savebarron2020 #savemelania2020. i hope i cleared everything up about trump not running for president and how he doesn’t need an app. so why did y’all make it him ..?

         trump is a ra_ist
      A) racist 
      B) rapist 
      C)all of above
